import { useEffect,useState } from "react" import { getNeighbour } from "./Neighbour" export const Neigh : React.FC = ():JSX.Element=>{ const [data,setData] = useState({ cases :0, deaths:0, recoveries:0, active:0 }) const [country,setCountry] = useState("germany") useEffect(()=>{ const fetchAffect =async ()=>{ const affect = await getNeighbour(country) console.log(affect) setData(affect) console.log(data) } fetchAffect() },[country]) return
